subject: JUnit4 and eclipse
msgSnippet: Hello, The link in JUnit.org website about how to use JUnit and eclipse is broken. My attempt to use JUnit with eclipse was to add the JUnit.jre file to the
messageBody:
Hello,
The link in JUnit.org website about how to use JUnit and eclipse is
broken.
My attempt to use JUnit with eclipse was to add the JUnit.jre file to
the project in properties, build path.
I added it and still cannot run JUnit4 code.
What else should I do in order that the JUnit4 will work with my
eclipse?

Thank you,
Ofer.
